title: Guadalupe Mountains National Park: Parks as Classrooms
body: Parks as Classrooms        Curriculum Materials Curriculum materials from Guadalupe Mountains National Park focus on Paleontology, Geological Science, History and Plant and Animal life in the park for elementary, middle school and high school students. All of the curriculum materials are aligned with Texas TEKS standards and Core Standards for New Mexico students in Science, Mathematics, Language Arts, History, Health and the Fine Arts. All Curriculum Materials   Lesson Plan    The Present is the Key to the Past Learn More     Field Trips Bring your students out to the Guadalupes for a one of a kind experience of the outdoors. Our staff is able to make presentations from a geological perspective emphasizing rock formations and fossils from the Permian Period. Our presentations on animal and plant life center on students comprehending the concept of ecosystems and wilderness. All Field Trips
